characters.name: Princess
characters.biography: Rich, fast, and not to be bothered with brutish things.

characters.name: Green Mage
characters.biography: She wields a rod, but her strength lies in her magic use.

characters.name: Thorak
characters.biography: By Chrom's will, he shall conquer you all!

characters.name: Ninja
characters.biography: He was better than the rest, but when he found out about the terrible experiments that made him, he began to hate. And then, over time, he began to hate everything. Also...ninja.

items.name: Potion
items.description: Heal a party member with this concoction.

items.name: Elixer
items.description: Complete recovery of health and magic strength.

items.name: Buster Sword
items.description: Heavy and deadly blade for warriors.

items.name: Phoenix Down
items.description: Bring a party member back to life.

items.name: Crystal
items.description: Magic orb that grant you abilities.
